Package smile.stat

Probability distributions and statistical hypothesis tests.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BIC
    Bayesian information criterion (BIC).
    Hypothesis
    Hypothesis test functions.
    Hypothesis.chisq
    Chi-square test.
    Hypothesis.cor
    Correlation test.
    Hypothesis.F
    F-test.
    Hypothesis.KS
    The Kolmogorov-Smirnov test (K-S test).
    Hypothesis.t
    t-test.
